name: SMS Myanmar Portal
description: SMS Myanmar Portal Application is mainly an University News and Announcements application.
fullDescription:
SMS Myanmar Portal Application is a comprehensive university management system that provides real-time access to news, announcements, and important updates. Features include:

• Real-time news and announcements
• Student portal access
• Exam Results
• Chat Ai Free Use
• Course information
• Academic calendar
• Event notifications
• Campus updates
• Emergency alerts

Stay connected with your university community through this essential mobile application.
